title: Crypto App UI/UX Design
subtitle: UI/UX Design built in figma
excerpt: Beautiful UI Design of crypto currency app.
body:
We built crypto currency mobile application UI/UX in figma software. We have team of experts that can make best UI/UX design based on your need.


JSG Developers build these design within 24 hours. Our designers also use advanced tools like photoshop, illustrator, and other adobe tools to make best UI for different needs.

title: Scan & PDF
subtitle: Document Scanner android app
excerpt: An android application to scan documents.
body: We built this application to solve the problem of scanning documents and storing them digitally. There were lots of flaws in existing application. We solved those and added PDF Tools. There are about 15 PDF tools simplifies your life.

title: India wedding card maker
subtitle: Easy to use Indian wedding card making application for android.
excerpt: An android application to simplify process of making wedding cards.
body: Wedding card app was built to ease the process of making wedding card invitations or wedding greetings. App allows users to create wedding cards and customize it by adding overlays and images and choose from over 50 fonts.
